info.title: Garden API
info.description: These are the API references for API v2.0.0. If you are looking for API v1.0.0 references, see here.

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: The `/auth` endpoint facilitates user authentication by generating a unique `nonce`, verifying `signed messages` for authenticity, and issuing a secure `JSON web token` (JWT) upon successful verification. This ensures authorized access to protected resources.

tags.name: Gasless
tags.description: The `/gasless` endpoints facilitates secure `initiation`, `redemption`, and `order creation` for cross-chain swaps. It ensures seamless transactions without gas fees while providing basic `health monitoring` for the service's status.

tags.name: Orderbook
tags.description: At the core of the Garden lies the `orderbook`. It is responsible for `order creation`, `matching`, and `settlement`. One can `create orders`, `track their status`, and securely settle them using `Atomic Swaps`.

tags.name: Quote
tags.description: Retrieves `token prices` and `Garden quotes` to provide users with up-to-date information for informed decision-making.
